SEARCH

Class CardGolden

java.lang.Object
Card
CardResource
CardGolden
public class CardGolden extends CardResource
The CardGolden class extends the CardResource class by adding constraints to its playability and generally increasing the points awarded when played.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<Resource,Integer>
    constraint
    Stores information about the playability constraint;
    The key of the map is the resource, and the value is an integer indicating how many units of that resource are required.
    private Item
    requiredItem
    If not null, specifies the item to be used as multiplier for the points awarded to the player.
    private boolean
    requiresCorner
    If the field is true then the card will multiply the number of points it will give out by the number of corners being covered when placing it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CardGolden(Corner[] corners, Resource resource, int points, Map<Resource,Integer> constraint)
    Constructor for CardGolden without point multipliers
    CardGolden(Corner[] corners, Resource resource, int points, Map<Resource,Integer> constraint, Item requiredItem, boolean requiresCorner)
    Constructor for CardGolden with point multiplier

    Method
    Description

    Returns the Map containing the constraints for the placement of this card.
    Item
    getRequiredItem()
    Returns what the required item is.
    boolean
    requiresCorner()
    Returns value of the requiresCorner flag.

  • Field Details

    • requiresCorner

      private boolean requiresCorner
      If the field is true then the card will multiply the number of points it will give out by the number of corners being covered when placing it.

    • requiredItem

      private Item requiredItem
      If not null, specifies the item to be used as multiplier for the points awarded to the player.

    • constraint

      private Map<Resource,Integer> constraint
      Stores information about the playability constraint;
      The key of the map is the resource, and the value is an integer indicating how many units of that resource are required.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardGolden

      public CardGolden(Corner[] corners, Resource resource, int points, Map<Resource,Integer> constraint)
      Constructor for CardGolden without point multipliers
      Parameters:
      corners - Array containing the corners of the card.
      resource - Resource type of the card. Allowed values are: ANIMAL,FUNGI,INSECT,PLANT.
      points - Points awarded by playing the card Face-Up.
      constraint - Mapinvalid input: '<'Resource, Integer>, Key is the required resource, value is the amount of it that is required.

    • CardGolden

      public CardGolden(Corner[] corners, Resource resource, int points, Map<Resource,Integer> constraint, Item requiredItem, boolean requiresCorner)
      Constructor for CardGolden with point multiplier
      Parameters:
      corners - Array containing the corners of the card.
      resource - Resource type of the card. Allowed values are: ANIMAL,FUNGI,INSECT,PLANT.
      points - Points awarded by playing the card Face-Up.
      constraint - Mapinvalid input: '<'Resource, Integer>, Key is the required resource, value is the amount of it that is required.
      requiredItem - Item to be used as points multiplier, Allowed values are: INKWELL,MANUSCRIPT,QUILL.
      requiresCorner - Flag, if true means that number of corners covered by placing this card is to be used as points multiplier.

  • Method Details

    • requiresCorner

      public boolean requiresCorner()
      Returns value of the requiresCorner flag.
      Returns:
      value of requiresCorner.

    • getRequiredItem

      public Item getRequiredItem()
      Returns what the required item is.
      Returns:
      value of requiredItem.

    • getConstraint

      public Map<Resource,Integer> getConstraint()
      Returns the Map containing the constraints for the placement of this card.
      Returns:
      Map where key is resource, value is required amount.
